body.name: Paula's Choice CALM Intensive Moisturizer for Dry + Sensitive Skin, Calms + Soothes Redness, Suitable for Rosacea-Prone & Eczema-Prone Skin, Fragrance-Free & Paraben-Free, 2 Fl Oz.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 19 hrs 39 mins
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 19 hrs 39 mins
features: DEEP HYDRATION FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: This gentle face moisturizer replenishes dry skin and improves barrier strength overnight.
VISIBLY REDUCE REDNESS: Research-backed calming ingredients soothe irritation and help to relieve redness.
IMPROVE WRINKLES & LINES: Sensitive skin shows signs of aging first. Antioxidants and emollients help to calm, visibly plump and revive a youthful look.
SUITABLE FOR ROSACEA- & ECZEMA-PRONE SKIN: Extra-gentle formulation is ideal for even the most delicate skin types.
Paula's Choice Skincare makes science-backed products that work. No fragrance, no parabens, no fluff. Just effective, cruelty-free formulas that target any concern from wrinkles to breakouts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love Paula’s choice products and this moisturizer is no exception! It’s been great at keeping my face moisturized no matter the weather outside. I have very sensitive skin and this moisturizer doesn’t cause break outs or sensitivity! Love the quality and it doesn’t have an odor! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good protectant for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: This product could be more moisturizing but it is excellent for my Rosacea problem. No breakouts! Probably worth using it with another product on the rest of my face for maximum moisture. Love the scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had a bad acne flair up that left my face full of red blemishes. I got this to use in addition to my nightly cream. It did calm my skin a bit but not significantly. Doesn’t smell particularly nice. I don’t think it’s worth the price, won’t buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fair dry sensitive to ingredients skin
reviews.reviewText: Almost bought every item that fits my needs…I really have become a fan of PC’s and I just learned about them in November—I’m sensitive to ingredients but no major issues except fine lines/redness around nose/discolor around eyes and dryness…— value for money — as long as they don’t go up I’ll be a lifer— moisturizing — yes it’s a nice morning one before makeup no pilling —-— for sensitive skin — yes definitely did not cause any harm …Check one of my pics every item I have bought at the moment

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great ONLY if you have an oil to mix in and probably a hydrating toner as well
reviews.reviewText: I have super sensitive skin to the point that moisturizers, even targeted for sensitive skin, burn my face. I have both rosacea and eczema which makes it difficult to find products. This cream has no scent but it also is more thick gel consistency and dries matte...which is the opposite of what dry skin needs. On its own it made my skin feel hydrated for maybe 10 seconds before it felt like the moisture was sucked out of my skin. But it doesn't burn my skin. Luckily, I have the moisture renewal oil (same brand) to add to this. The oil didn't work with my old moisturizer and I didn't want to toss it because of how expensive it is. On a whim, I found it works perfectly with this moisturizer. It takes exactly three drops mixed in to make my skin actually feel hydrated. With that said, I have also found that I have to use quite a bit to cover my face. Normally I can make a 1 oz tube/jar of lotion last a few months, with this, I am barely making it to the one month mark and this is a 2 oz tube!I have to use between a nickel to quarter size amount (PLUS the oil) to cover my face and I use this twice a day. I also bought the face wash and toner from the same line to help with the moisture. The toner helps a lot so if you buy this, you definitely need a moisturizing toner and face oil to go along with it. This product is awful on its own unless maybe you have oily skin. I don't even think normal skin would be hydrated by this. I gave it three stars because it doesn't break me out or burn my skin which is a miracle. I am going to repurchase only because I have the oil to make it work. But I am definitely going to explore their other moisturizers.Tl;dr Awful product on its own. Too drying and not cost effective for amount needed (2 oz tube barely lasts a month with twice daily application). Plus you need an oil to mix in for actual hydration and potentially a hydrating toner as well. Only plus is that it doesn't burn on application or cause breakouts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fixed my red nose
reviews.reviewText: I almost never review products. In fact, this is probably the first non-book product I've ever used and I've ordered an embarrassingly high quantity of products from Amazon. I'm 36 and my whole life I've had a red nose. I've spent my whole adult life trying different concealers for it and I've used pricey ones- Il makiage, tarte's shape tape, make up forever, Nars etc etc and my red nose always ends up showing through my foundation by the end of the day.Today was my second day using this product and it's 9 pm and my nose still doesn't look red. I'm amazed!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars helps with redness and extreme dryness
reviews.reviewText: sometimes i break out in hives and rashes on my face. this was the only product that helped alleviate the dryness and soreness. excellent product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Product separated and pilled
reviews.reviewText: The product initially had good consistency, not too oily on skin/Mattifying yet felt hydrated. Almost like petroleum consistency which is good as a skin barrier. After a couple days (stored in closet, not extreme temp) I noticed the product had coagulated and separated. When coming out of the tube it came out in chunks. Some creamy some chunky. Disgusting. Doesn’t mis well with other products and caused pilling. Like your skin is peeling off except it’s the moisturizer. I used to get drunk elephant and was trying out something new for night hydration. This was not it. Wouldn’t recommend although I love the Paula’s choice brand these new formulas need work.
